bug.summary: unity ml-agents Vector action "Index was outside the bounds of the array"
bug.description: hello,I'm new with the unity ml-agent,I want the agent follow target in 3-d space, but when I test, there is a error"Index was outside the bounds of the array. "this error is IndexOutOfRangeException: Index was outside the bounds of the array. AUVAgent3D.AgentAction (System.Single[] vectorAction, System.String textAction) I set Vector action as "continus, space size = 3"
